ctwas 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Tutorial
    • Pipepline of using multigroup cTWAS with summary statistics
  • Source

Reference

All functions

EM()

Run EM to estimate parameters. Iteratively run susie and estimate parameters - RSS version

add_z_to_regionlist()

add z-scores from z_snp and z_gene to regionlist

adjust_boundary_genes()

adjust regionlist for boundary genes

anno_susie()

annotate susie results with SNP and gene information

assign_region_ids()

assign gene and SNP IDs for regions in the regioninfo

coef(<susie>)

Extract regression coefficients from susie fit

combine_z()

Combine SNP and gene z-scores

compute_gene_z()

Compute gene z-scores

compute_region_cor()

Compute correlation matrices for a region

compute_ss()

Compute sufficient statistics for susie.

convert_geno_to_LD_matrix()

Convert PLINK genotype data to LD matrices and SNP info files, save LD matrices as .RDS files and SNP info as .Rvar files

ctwas_locus_plot()

Plot the output of cTWAS at a single locus

ctwas_locus_plot_genetrack()

Create the gene track for the cTWAS locus plot

ctwas_sumstats()

Causal inference for TWAS using summary statistics

ctwas_susie_rss()

Run cTWAS version of susie_rss for a single region

detect_ld_mismatch_susie()

Detect LD mismatches using SuSiE RSS

est_param()

Estimate cTWAS parameters

estimate_s_rss()

Estimate s in susie_rss Model Using Regularized LD

expand_regionlist()

Expand regionlist with full SNPs

finemap_region()

run cTWAS finemapping for a single region

finemap_regions()

run cTWAS finemapping for multiple regions

finemap_regions_L1()

run cTWAS finemapping for multiple regions with L = 1

get_gene_info()

get gene info from weights

get_gene_regions()

get regions for each gene

get_problematic_regions()

Get regions with problematic high PIP SNPs or genes

get_regionlist()

Get regionlist for each region in region_info

harmonize_wgt_ld()

Harmonize weight to match ld reference genotypes. Flip signs when reverse complement matches, remove ambiguous variants from the prediction models

harmonize_z_ld()

Harmonize z scores from GWAS to match ld reference genotypes. Flip signs when reverse complement matches, remove strand ambiguous SNPs

initiate_group_priors()

set pi_prior and V_prior based on init_group_prior and init_group_prior_var

kriging_rss() kriging_rss()

Compute Distribution of z-scores of Variant j Given Other z-scores, and Detect Possible Allele Switch Issue

label_merged_regions()

Function to identify consecutive regions and label them

load_LD()

Load LD matrix

load_weights()

Load PredictDB or Fusion weights

predict(<susie>)

Predict outcomes or extract coefficients from susie fit.

prep_pgen()

Read .pgen file into R

prep_pvar()

Prepare .pvar file

preprocess_weights()

Preprocess PredictDB/Fusion weights and harmonize with LD reference

preprocess_z_snp()

Preprocess GWAS z-scores, harmonize GWAS z-scores with LD reference

read_LD_SNP_file()

read a single LD SNP info file as a data frame

read_LD_SNP_files()

read all LD SNP info files as a data frame

read_bim()

Read .bim file into R

read_pgen()

Read pgen file into R

read_pvar()

Read .pvar file into R

read_var_info()

Read variant information from .pvar or .bim file into R

region2core()

assign regions to cores

screen_regions()

Screen regions

select_highPIP_regions()

Select regions with high non-SNP PIPs

select_single_effect_regions()

Select single effect regions

summarize_param()

Summarize and plot cTWAS parameter estimates

susie() susie_suff_stat()

Sum of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression

susie_get_objective() susie_get_posterior_mean() susie_get_posterior_sd() susie_get_niter() susie_get_prior_variance() susie_get_residual_variance() susie_get_lfsr() susie_get_posterior_samples() susie_get_cs() susie_get_pip()

Inferences From Fitted SuSiE Model

susie_init_coef()

Initialize a susie object using regression coefficients

susie_rss()

Sum of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression using summary statistics

trim_regionlist()

Remove SNPs from regionlist if the total number of SNPs exceeds limit

univariate_regression()

Perform Univariate Linear Regression Separately for Columns of X

Contents

Developed by Siming Zhao, Wesley Crouse, Sheng Qian, Kaixuan Luo, Matthew Stephens, Xin He.
